description.description: The description of the app, used by search engines

theme.description: The configuration for the theme of the app

color.description: The primary color of the app

editThisNote.description: The configuration for the "Edit this note" link that redirects to the repo where the notes are stored and allows users to edit the note.

url.description: The URL to edit the note. Supported placeholders: {{file}} and {{branch}}

openInNewTab.description: Whether to open the edit link in a new tab

links.description: A list of links that are displayed after the main navigation

items.description: A link to display in the sidebar

label.description: The displayed label of the link

icon.description: The icon of the link, see https://feathericons.com/ for a list of icons

openInNewTab.description: Whether to open the link in a new tab

notes.description: A list of grouped notes that are displayed in the sidebar

items.description: A group of notes to display in the sidebar

pattern.description: A RegEx pattern to match notes to display in this group

expanded.description: Whether the group should be expanded by default. Ignored if the group has no label.

tags.description: A list of tags to match notes

tree.description: If the notes should be displayed as a tree

expanded.description: Whether the tree should be expanded by default. If a boolean is provided, it will be used for all levels. If a number is provided, the first n levels (starting with 1) will be expanded while all others are collapsed. If a string is provided, it will be used as a RegEx pattern to match the paths of the folders that are expanded by default.

replace.description: A map of search/replace values that will be applied to the paths of the notes in the tree. The keys are case-insensitive RegEx patterns.
